nowrap;max-width:1200px;padding:15px;margin-bottom:50px}.topic__container footer .contact{width:100%}.topic__container footer label{width:100%;margin:10px}.topic__container footer form{padding:0}}.topic__container-main{display:grid;grid-area:main;grid-template-areas:"title title title" "summary summary key" "summary summary key " "review review review" "image image image";width:100%;justify-content:center;margin:100px auto 0;padding:5px}.topic__container-main strong{font-size:3.4rem;margin-bottom:25px}.topic__container-main p{width:85%;padding-left:50px}@media screen and (max-width:1200px){.topic__container-main{display:flex;flex-flow:column nowrap;max-width:100%}.topic__container-main strong{font-size:1.4rem;margin-bottom:25px}.topic__container-main p{width:85%;padding-left:50px}}.topic__title{display:flex;grid-area:title;justify-content:space-between;width:100%;height:100vh;margin-bottom:20px}.topic__title img{margin-top:10%;width:100%;height:50vh}.topic__title .topic__title-info{display:flex;flex-flow:column nowrap;margin:50px;width:70%}.topic__title .topic__title-info h1{margin-top:30%;font-size:6rem}.topic__title .topic__title-info p{font-size:1.5rem}@media screen and (max-width:1200px){.topic__title{display:flex;flex-flow:column nowrap;max-width:100%;padding:25px;margin-bottom:100px;height:auto}.topic__title h1{font-size:4rem;margin-top:50px}.topic__title img{margin-top:20px}.topic__title .topic__title-info{width:90%;margin-left:15px;width:100%}}.topic__summary{grid-area:summary;display:flex;flex-flow:column nowrap;width:100%;box-shadow:2px 2px 2px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.304);border:none;border-radius:.5rem;padding:100px;margin-bottom:25px}.topic__summary p{font-size:1.5rem;text-indent:25px}@media screen and (max-width:1200px){.topic__summary{display:flex;flex-flow:column nowrap;max-width:100%;padding:25px;margin-bottom:50px}.topic__summary p{font-size:1rem;text-indent:15px}}.topic__key{grid-area:key;display:flex;flex-flow:column nowrap;width:100%;box-shadow:2px 2px 2px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.304);border:none;border-radius:.5rem;padding:100px;margin-right:5px;margin-bottom:25px;background-color:var(--clr-bg-light);color:#fff}.topic__key p{font-size:2rem;text-indent:25px}.topic__key li{font-size:1.2rem}@media screen and (max-width:1200px){.topic__key{display:flex;flex-flow:column nowrap;max-width:100%;padding:25px;margin-bottom:50px}.topic__key p{font-size:1rem;text-indent:15px}}.topic__review{grid-area:review;display:flex;flex-flow:column nowrap;width:100%;box-shadow:2px 2px 2px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.304);border:none;border-radius:.5rem;padding:100px;margin-bottom:25px}.topic__review p{font-size:1.5rem;text-indent:25px}@media screen and (max-width:1200px){.topic__review{display:flex;flex-flow:column nowrap;max-width:100%;padding:25px;margin-bottom:50px}.topic__review p{font-size:1rem;text-indent:15px}}@keyframes navLinkFade{0%{opacity:0;transform:translateX(50px)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateX(0)}}.transform{transform:translateX(100%)}
